sentences.en: He has the greatest disregard for all formality.
He is already assured of the job and his interview is a mere formality.
sentences.cn: 他已经肯定获得那份工作了,口头审查仅是形式而已.

sentences.en: In some ways, the official opening is a formality.
sentences.cn: 从某些方面来说，正式的开幕仪式只不过是走个形式。

sentences.en: In the times of the emperors, the formality within the Forbidden City was rigid beyond belief.
sentences.cn: 在帝王时代, 紫禁城内的礼仪异常严格,令人难以置信.

sentences.en: It's a formality which we have to go through.
sentences.cn: 它是我们必须办理的一项手续.

sentences.en: It's not just a formality. It's also a matter of courtesy.
sentences.cn: 这不只是形式, 这也是礼貌上该做的事.

sentences.en: Lillith's formality and seriousness amused him.
sentences.cn: 利莉思的拘礼和严肃让他觉得好笑。

sentences.en: She didn't like the formality of the party.
sentences.cn: 她不喜欢宴会拘泥的礼节.

sentences.en: The confession was a formality, though the torture was real.
sentences.cn: 招供不过是个形式, 但拷打却是货真价实的.

sentences.en: the formalities necessary for a valid marriage
sentences.cn: 有效婚姻所需的正式手续

sentences.en: The level of formality determines the precise mode of expression.
sentences.cn: 不同的礼节程度决定所需的确切表达方式.

sentences.en: The manager's signature was just a formality.
sentences.cn: 经理的签字只是一种形式.

sentences.en: The time had come to cross the great divide between formality and truth.
sentences.cn: 是时候跨越形式与真理之间的巨大分界线了。

sentences.en: We must take a serious attitude in summing up our work, and not just make it a mere formality.
sentences.cn: 总结工作要认真, 不要走过场.

sentences.en: With the Cold War almost over, the talks were a mere formality.
sentences.cn: 随着冷战即将结束，对话就只是一种形式了。
